tracks.text: Segawa lies face down in her apartment. A cartoon bear lies face down in a blizzard.
Segawa rolls over.
Aoi picks up her own phone
Shizuka Sakaki, Rookie Voice Actor, stands in the rain near an office building.
She holds an audition script.
Intro
At the Musashino offices at night
Aoi stares at him
Title card
Endo looks at a drawing of a character through a transparent yellow paper. He draws a line over the chin of the character, then lifts the yellow paper and reviews the unobstructed drawing.
Key Animation Uchida reviews the drawings.
Colorer Shinkawa colors the drawing on a computer. Aoi leans over.

Director of Photography Sakura draws lines over the colored drawing. He clicks a button, and the outlined area gains a lens flair. Then, a mall background appears behind the character. He opens a color picker dialog as Aoi approaches.
Aoi bows. Sakura picks up a piece of paper and hands it to her.

Ema, a Key Animator, stands outside with a phone to her ear. She watches as Aoi walks through a door, down the stairs, and around the sidewalk. Ema leans over the railing and waves, but Aoi doesn't notice.
Zuka cleans in a restaurant. She has long red hair in a ponytail.
Ema watches Key Animator Sugie walk away. At the recording studio, Director Kinoshita holds a pencil over a blank spot of paper.
Kinoshita taps his pencil. He frowns and rests his chin in his hand. 3 girls approach.
The booth with actors
Sketches of a theme park appear. The 3 actresses stand at microphones.
Sound Director looks at the script
Mixer Yamabuchi pushes 3 faders forward. A red light turns on.
Ramen shop
Taro thumbs up
In the Studio, Aoi watches Exodus
On the anime, a purple haired woman's hair blows in the wind.
Akane and Aya turn to Aurpin.
Episode Director Yamada side-eyes Kinoshita
Line Producer Nabe-P looks up from his phone.
At the Musashino offices at night, staff gather in a tight conference room
Marukawa hands Aoi snacks
He raises his hands in the hair.
He gestures to the table. Everyone turns.
Aoi gestures to the table. It glows with a purple light. Aya, Akane, and Aurpin float in a circle, eyes closed.
The staff stare up, eyes wide. The light shines through the conference room windows in the dark office.
Kinoshita smiles and bawls.
Arupin floats to Kinoshita and takes his hands, smiling.
Aya floats to Yamada.
Akane twirls in the center of the table.
The light glows in the window of the building, in the empty night.
Conference room
Taro throws the plate with 100 meatball sized takoyaki. Ogasawara elegantly catches the plate and balls..
Aoi passes Marukawa and runs down the hall to her desk.
She picks up an envelope
and runs back to the conference room.
Outro
